doc:
Clive Brook https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clive_Brook 0 Clifford Hardman "Clive" Brook (1 June 1887 – 17 November 1974) was an English film actor. After making his first screen appearance in 1920, Brook emerged as a leading British actor in the early 1920s. After moving to the United States, Brook became one of the major stars for Paramount Pictures in the late silent era. During 1928–29 he successfully made the transition to sound and continued to be featured in many of Hollywood's most prestigious films, including a number of literary adaptations. In the mid-1930s he returned to England, where he appeared regularly in leading film roles for a further decade. Clifford_Hardman_"_Clive_"_Brook ( 1_June_1887 – 17_November_1974 ) was an_English_film_actor . After making his_first_screen_appearance in 1920 , Brook emerged as a_leading_British_actor in the_early_1920s . After moving to the_United_States , Brook became one of the_major_stars for Paramount_Pictures in the_late_silent_era . During 1928 – 29 he successfully made the_transition to_sound and continued_to_be_featured in many of Hollywood 's_most_prestigious_films , including a_number of literary_adaptations . In the_mid-1930s he returned to England , where he appeared regularly in leading film_roles for a_further_decade .
